Divine Name.quote: But you, LORD, are the Most High over all the earth. (Psalm 97:9)

Divine Unity.quote: Hear, O Israel: The LORD our God, the LORD is one. (Deuteronomy 6:4)

Divine Sovereignty.quote: Yours, O LORD, is the greatness and the power and the glory and the majesty and the splendor. (1 Chronicles 29:11)

Divine Covenant.quote: I will take you as my own people, and I will be your God. (Exodus 6:7)

Divine Justice.quote: For the LORD is a God of justice; blessed are all who wait for him. (Isaiah 30:18)

Divine Mercy.quote: The LORD, the LORD, the compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, abounding in love and faithfulness. (Exodus 34:6)

Divine Creation.quote: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth. (Genesis 1:1)

Divine Protection.quote: The LORD is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer. (Psalm 18:2)

Divine Wisdom.quote: For the LORD gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding. (Proverbs 2:6)

Divine Presence.quote: Where can I go from your Spirit? Where can I flee from your presence? (Psalm 139:7)

Divine Law.quote: The law of the LORD is perfect, refreshing the soul. (Psalm 19:7)

Divine Holiness.quote: Holy, holy, holy is the LORD Almighty; the whole earth is full of his glory. (Isaiah 6:3)

Divine Redemption.quote: In his love and mercy he redeemed them; he lifted them up and carried them. (Isaiah 63:9)

Divine Truth.quote: The LORD is near to all who call on him, to all who call on him in truth. (Psalm 145:18)

Divine Guidance.quote: He guides the humble in what is right and teaches them his way. (Psalm 25:9)

Divine Promise.quote: Know therefore that the LORD your God is God; he is the faithful God, keeping his covenant of love. (Deuteronomy 7:9)

Divine Judgment.quote: For the LORD will judge his people and have compassion on his servants. (Psalm 135:14)

Divine Power.quote: Ah, Sovereign LORD, you have made the heavens and the earth by your great power. (Jeremiah 32:17)

Divine Glory.quote: The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands. (Psalm 19:1)

Divine Providence.quote: The LORD will keep you from all harm—he will watch over your life. (Psalm 121:7)

Divine Blessing.quote: The LORD bless you and keep you; the LORD make his face shine on you. (Numbers 6:24-25)

Divine Knowledge.quote: O LORD, you have searched me and you know me. (Psalm 139:1)

Divine Voice.quote: The voice of the LORD is powerful; the voice of the LORD is majestic. (Psalm 29:4)

Divine Eternity.quote: Before the mountains were born or you brought forth the earth and the world, from everlasting to everlasting you are God. (Psalm 90:2)

Divine Kingship.quote: The LORD reigns forever and ever. (Exodus 15:18)

Divine Peace.quote: The LORD gives strength to his people; the LORD blesses his people with peace. (Psalm 29:11)

Divine Commandments.quote: The commands of the LORD are radiant, giving light to the eyes. (Psalm 19:8)

Divine Salvation.quote: The LORD is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear? (Psalm 27:1)

Divine Faithfulness.quote: Your faithfulness continues through all generations. (Psalm 119:90)

Divine Victory.quote: The LORD your God is the one who goes with you to fight for you against your enemies to give you victory. (Deuteronomy 20:4)
